sense.def:
To contrive to do something difficult
pomeni, da nam uspe storiti nekaj težavnega.

seg.quote: I shall contrive to see you again.
Mike contrived to grin without taking his cigar out of his mouth.

sense.def:
To contrive an event or situation
pomeni sprožiti neki dogodek ali okoliščine.

seg.quote: Confidential talks with professors were contrived by reporters posing as students.
